product.longDescription: Tall plants with fern-like dark green foliage dotted with tiny cream-yellow colored flowers. Use foliage for wreaths and as filler for mixed bouquets. Also known as sweet sagewort, sweet wormwood, and Chinese wormwood. USDA Certified Organic. Ht. 48-72". Avg. 585,700 seeds/oz. Packet: 500 seeds.
